definitions.definition: An integrated development environment (IDE) is a software application that provides comprehensive facilities to computer programmers for software development.
definitions.term_usage_example: Eclipse is a popular IDE among Java developers.

definitions.definition: Un entorno de desarrollo integrado (IDE) es una aplicación de software que proporciona instalaciones completas a los programadores informáticos para el desarrollo de software.
definitions.term_usage_example: Eclipse es un IDE popular entre los desarrolladores de Java.
